title: Trooping the colour, [1947]
brief_description: Presents the ceremony of Trooping the Colour on the occasion of King George VI’s birthday on 9th June, 1947(?) with the then Princess Elizabeth taking the salute. Also includes segments on the Royal Braemar Gathering, attended by King George VI, Princess Elizabeth and Princess Margaret, and Changing of the Guard. This is a silent film with captions.
